articles.author: Ronald Blum
articles.title: Acclaimed composer Kaija Saariaho dies at age 70 of brain tumor - The Associated Press
articles.description: Kaija Saariaho, who wrote acclaimed works that made her the among the most prominent composers of the 21st century, died Friday. She was 70. Saariaho died at her apartment in Paris, her family said in a statement  posted on her Facebook page.
articles.content:

articles.title: Will Kroger Field’s parking lot be able to handle busy weekend? - WKYT
articles.description: Kroger Field is often packed in the fall due to football fans filling the stands, but this weekend the parking lots will be filled, and it’s not for football.
